languages.text: Each critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} or kill on an enemy grants the wearer +5% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}hit chance{/g} and +5% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}. An attack that misses the target resets this {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Each critical hit or kill of an enemy grants the wielder +5% critical hit chance and +5% critical damage (maximum of both bonuses — 30%). An attack that misses the target resets these bonuses.

Each critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} or kill on an enemy grants the wearer +5% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}hit chance{/g} and +5% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}. An attack that misses the target resets this {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.

Each critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} or kill on an enemy grants the wearer +5% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}hit chance{/g} and +5% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}. An attack that misses the target resets this {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.

languages.text: Cada {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} crítico o muerte infligido a un enemigo concede al portador +5 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}probabilidad de impacto{/g} crítico y +5 % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}daño crítico{/g}. Si un ataque falla contra su objetivo, la {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} se reinicia.
languages.original_text: Each critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} or kill on an enemy grants the wearer +5% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}hit chance{/g} and +5% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}. An attack that misses the target resets this {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cada {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacto{/g} crítico o muerte infligido a un enemigo concede al portador +5 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}probabilidad de impacto{/g} crítico y +5 % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}daño crítico{/g} (límite de ambas {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g}: 30 %). Si un ataque falla contra su objetivo, las bonificaciones se reinician.

languages.text: 每当装备者对敌人造成{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}{/g}暴击或击杀敌人时，都会获得+5%{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}暴击率{/g}与+5%{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击伤害{/g}。然而，若攻击未能命中目标，则此{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}效果重置。
languages.original_text: Each critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} or kill on an enemy grants the wearer +5% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}hit chance{/g} and +5% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}. An attack that misses the target resets this {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者对敌人造成暴击或击杀敌人时，都会获得+5%{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}暴击率{/g}与+5%{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}暴击伤害{/g}（两项{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}的最大值为30%）。{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}{/g}如果未能命中敌人，加成效果会被重置。

languages.text: Chaque {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g} critique ou chaque élimination d'un ennemi confère à l'utilisateur +5 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}chances d'infliger un coup{/g} critique et +5 % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}dégâts critiques{/g}. Toute attaque qui manque la cible réinitialise ce {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.
languages.original_text: Each critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} or kill on an enemy grants the wearer +5% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}hit chance{/g} and +5% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}. An attack that misses the target resets this {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}coup{/g} critique ou chaque élimination d'un ennemi confère à l'utilisateur +5 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}chances d'infliger un coup{/g} critique et +5 % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}dégâts critiques{/g} (maximum des deux {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} - 30 %). Toute attaque qui manque la cible réinitialise ces bonus.

languages.text: Jeder kritische {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g} oder jeder getötete Feind gewährt dem Träger +5 % kritische {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}Trefferchance{/g} und +5 % {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Schaden{/g}. Dieser {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} wird von einem Angriff, der das Ziel verfehlt, zurückgesetzt.
languages.original_text: Each critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} or kill on an enemy grants the wearer +5% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}hit chance{/g} and +5% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}. An attack that misses the target resets this {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Jeder {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}kritischer Treffer{/g} oder jeder getötete Feind gewährt dem Träger +5 % kritische {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}Trefferchance{/g} und +5 % {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}kritischen Schaden{/g} (Maximum beider {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g} — 30 %). Diese Boni werden einem Angriff, der das Ziel verfehlt, zurückgesetzt.

languages.text: 敵に対するそれぞれのクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}ヒット{/g}または殺害で、使用者に+5%のクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}ヒット率{/g}と、+5%の{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルダメージ{/g}が付与される 。ターゲットを外した攻撃は、これらの{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}をリセットする。
languages.original_text: Each critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} or kill on an enemy grants the wearer +5% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}hit chance{/g} and +5% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}. An attack that misses the target resets this {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 敵に対するそれぞれのクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}ヒット{/g}または殺害で、使用者に+5%のクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}ヒット率{/g}と、+5%の{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルダメージ{/g}が付与される 。ターゲットを外した攻撃は、これらの{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}をリセットする。

languages.text: Каждое совершенное {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическое попадание{/g} или убийство противника дает персонажу +5% к шансу критического {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадания{/g} и +5% критического урона. При промахе {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусы{/g} обнуляются.
languages.original_text: Each critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} or kill on an enemy grants the wearer +5% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}hit chance{/g} and +5% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}. An attack that misses the target resets this {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Каждое совершенное {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}критическое попадание{/g} или убийство противника дает персонажу +5% к шансу критического попадания и +5% критического урона (оба {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонуса{/g} не могут превышать 30%). При промахе бонусы обнуляются.

Каждое совершенное {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}критическое попадание{/g} или убийство противника дает персонажу +5% к шансу критического попадания и +5% критического урона (оба {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонуса{/g} не могут превышать 30%). При промахе бонусы обнуляются.
